items.sentence: Neither Tom nor Mary has been trying to get in shape.
Neither Tom nor Mary has been told about the problem.
Neither Tom nor Mary has been taking the bus to work.
Neither Tom nor Mary has been in there for very long.
Neither Tom nor Mary has been getting ready to leave.
Neither Tom nor Mary has been a very good role model.
It took a long time for Tom to get over Mary's death.
It sounds like Tom doesn't want to go hiking with us.
I'm not going to tell Tom how much I paid for my car.
I told Tom who I thought would be the next president.
